title: Food-Delivery Web App
description: Providing streamlined solution for ordering food. Uses Swiggy Live API for fetching food items and ReduxJs for cart functionality.

title: Event Booking Website
description: Event booking application built with ReactJs, Tailwind CSS and other libraries. Uses cool features such as lazy loading to efficieny load data from custom API.

title: Music Streaming Web Application
description: music streaming web application built with ReactJS, seamlessly harnessing the power of the YouTube API for an extensive library of tracks and videos
